name: Bravo Sample: Homebnb app
description:
Made for Bravo Studio.


Create an Airbnb-like app with a sample Figma file. The file includes layers named with Bravo Tags, containers, and other essential setup. 🤓


To see the final result, log in to Bravo Studio > Sample Apps section and duplicate this app. The duplicated app will include a connected API collection and data binding. Test it with Bravo Vision previewer app 🚀


Watch the tutorial on how to build this app with Bravo Studio.


Check out Bravo Studio 👏

www.bravostudio.app
